resources.string:
Supposely you should write something about yourself here but since I do not know what to write, 
\I will talk about our lord and saviour Gabe Newell. 
\Since his ascendent, we humanity has been blessed by his ability of maintaining a gaming platform 
	hat gifted us many, many games that have changed uncountable amount of peoples hobby, perspective, lifestyle, and even life. 
\His importance was that without him, human's life would be much more boring and lifeless, 
\world would be black and white without colour. 
\However, with his 250kg beast weight shows his untiltable, his bouncy belly that makes people recall the touch of the mother Maria, 
\his manly beard that resemble the courage of vikings.
